track.name: Foundations
track.description: Core cybersecurity fundamentals and analyst mindset.

challenges.title: CIA Breach
challenges.description: A company reports unauthorized data exposure, altered records, and brief system outage. Identify the most critical CIA impact highlighted in this scenario.

challenges.title: Integrity Under Fire
challenges.description: Patient records were silently modified by an unauthorized actor. Determine which security principle was violated.

challenges.title: The Data Leak
challenges.description: An internal document repository was exposed to external users. Classify the violated CIA pillar.

challenges.title: System Down
challenges.description: A core authentication service was knocked offline for two hours. Identify the CIA principle impacted most.

challenges.title: Threat vs Risk
challenges.description: Classify scenario elements into threat, vulnerability, and risk impact categories using standard risk terminology.

challenges.title: Identify the Vulnerability
challenges.description: Review a short infrastructure scenario and identify which weakness is the actual vulnerability, not the threat actor or impact.

challenges.title: Attack Surface Mapping
challenges.description: Map external and internal attack surfaces across web, API, exposed SSH, and human phishing vectors.

challenges.title: Insider Alert
challenges.description: Investigate suspicious privileged activity and identify why the event pattern points to insider threat behavior.

challenges.title: Kill Chain Breakdown
challenges.description: Given an intrusion timeline, map each attacker action to the correct kill chain stage.

challenges.title: MITRE Mapper
challenges.description: Map observed attacker behavior to MITRE ATT&CK tactics and techniques at a foundational level.
